original_text:
4 Fantastic Fish In Egypt
Nella nuova slot dal titolo 4 Fantastic Fish in Egypt troverete fantastici Bonus, un sarcofago speciale, squali, calamari giganti e ben 4.096 modi per vincere!
Un mix di temi classici
La produttrice di giochi Yggdrasil ha deciso di fondere due temi classici cari ai maggiori giocatori di slot: la pesca e l’Antico Egitto.
In passato c’era già stato 4 Fantastic Fish, qui semplicemente il gioco è ambientato in Egitto, tanto che confrontando le due slot troviamo minime differenze sia a livello grafico che di gameplay.
La griglia di gioco è in parte sommersa in un Nilo dalle acque limpidissime e se non fosse per le piramidi e le sfingi che si notano sullo sfondo, non diremmo di essere nella terra dei faraoni. I simboli, disegnati con uno stile cartoon, hanno linee morbide e differenze di colore che producono un effetto tridimensionale.
Caratteristiche del gioco
La griglia di 4 Fantastic Fish in Egypt, leggermente più grande del solito, ha 6 rulli e 4 righe. Ciò vuol dire che ad ogni Spin vedremo atterrare 24 simboli, quelli che servono per formare uno dei 4.096 modi per vincere.
La scommessa base è molto contenuta, si parte da appena 0,10 € e può essere innalzata sino a 80 €. La vincita massima è di 11.100 volte la puntata.
Autoplay è la funzione che attiva i giri automatici, minimo 5 e massimo 100.
4 Fantastic Fish in Egypt ha una volatilità molto alta e un RTP del 96%.
Simboli e gameplay
Innanzitutto, diciamo che per vincere è necessario creare combo di almeno 3 simboli per quelli di basso e medio livello, mentre con i simboli di alto livello ne bastano 2. Rientrano nel gruppo dei simboli meno remunerativi le carte da gioco dal dieci all’asso; invece, i premi di media grandezza si ottengono grazie alla cassetta del pescatore e alla canna da pesca. Le somme più alte si vincono con il gatto, il gabbiano e Cleopatra, ma se si desidera avere una stima precisa delle somme è meglio accedere alla tabella dei pagamenti.
Un ulteriore simbolo è il pesce, che è sempre associato a una somma di denaro.
Lo yacht è il Wild e sostituisce tutti i simboli base per concludere una combinazione pagante.
Il pesce spada è lo Scatter e ne servono 3 per ottenere 3 Respins. I rulli su cui sono atterrati i simboli Bonus saranno liberi, gli altri invece resteranno bloccati. Avremo solo simboli pesci che resteranno incollati ai rulli durante l’intera funzione. Inoltre, ogni volta che ne atterra uno, il conteggio dei Respin viene riportato a 3. La comparsa dello Scatter su un rullo bloccato lo libera, mentre se il rullo è interamente coperto dai pesci, apparire uno squalo che li mangerà e moltiplicherà la vincita x2.
Un altro Scatter è il sarcofago che può attivare 4 funzioni:

Squalo, che, come abbiamo visto, incassa tutti i premi
Calamaro gigante che cambia la posizione dei pesci per ottenere delle vincite oppure sposta i pesci da rulli bloccati a quelli liberi.
Collector: incassa tutte le vincite senza rimuovere i pesci (che quindi continueranno a pagare alfine della funzione)
Aumento di valore: aumenta il valore dei pesci.

Per vincere il Jackpot è necessario che sul sesto rullo attedi uno dei pesci giganti.

Domande Frequenti 
Quanti sono i modi per vincere?

I modi per vincere sono 4.096.



Come posso vincere il Jackpot?

Per ottenere il Jackpot è necessario l’arrivo di uno dei 4 pesci speciali sul sesto rullo.



Come posso ottenere la funzione speciale?

O attraverso gli Scatter, o acquistando la funzione.

raw_translation.response:
4 Fantastic Fish In Egypt

In the new slot game titled 4 Fantastic Fish in Egypt, you'll find fantastic bonuses, a special sarcophagus, sharks, giant squids, and 4,096 ways to win! This game is a fusion of two classic themes beloved by seasoned slot players: fishing and ancient Egypt. 

In the past, there was already a game called 4 Fantastic Fish, and here, the game is simply set in Egypt. Comparing the two slots, we find minimal differences in both graphics and gameplay. The game board is partially submerged in the crystal-clear waters of the Nile, and if not for the pyramids and sphinxes visible in the background, we wouldn't know we are in the land of the pharaohs. 

The symbols, drawn in a cartoonish style, have soft lines and color variations that produce a three-dimensional effect. The game grid of 4 Fantastic Fish in Egypt, a little larger than usual, has 6 reels and 4 rows. This means that with every spin, we'll see 24 symbols land to form one of the 4,096 ways to win. 

The basic bet is quite modest, starting from just € 0.10 and can be raised up to € 80. The maximum win is 11,100 times the bet. Autoplay is the function that activates automatic spins, with a minimum of 5 and a maximum of 100. 4 Fantastic Fish in Egypt has a very high volatility and an RTP of 96%. 

To win, you need to create combos of at least 3 symbols for low and medium-level ones, while with high-level symbols, you only need two. The lowest-paying symbols are the playing cards from 10 to Ace, while medium-sized prizes are obtained thanks to the fisherman's chest and fishing rod. The highest sums are won with the cat, seagull, and Cleopatra, but for a precise estimate of the amounts, it is best to access the payout table. 

Another symbol is the fish, which is always associated with a sum of money. The yacht is the Wild, replacing all basic symbols to create a paying combination. The swordfish is the Scatter, and you need three to get three Respins. The reels where the Bonus symbols landed will be free, while the others will remain locked. During the whole function, we'll only have fish symbols that will remain stuck to the reels. Additionally, every time we land one, the Respin count is reset to three. The appearance of the Scatter on a locked reel frees it, while if the reel is fully covered with fish symbols, a shark will appear, eating them and multiplying the win by x2. 

Another Scatter is the sarcophagus that can activate 4 functions: 

- Shark, which, as we've seen, collects all prizes
- Giant squid, which changes the position of the fish to obtain wins or moves the fish from locked to free reels. 
- Collector: collects all wins without removing the fish (so they'll continue to pay out until the end of the function)
- Value increase: increases the value of the fish. 

To win the Jackpot, you need to land one of the giant fish on the sixth reel. 

FAQs 
- How many ways to win are there? 
- There are 4,096 ways to win. 

- How can I win the Jackpot? 
- To win the Jackpot, you need one of the 4 special fish to land on the sixth reel. 

- How can I activate the special function? 
- Either through the Scatters, or by purchasing the function.

Review: 4 Fantastic Fish in Egypt
In the new slot game "4 Fantastic Fish in Egypt" you will find amazing bonuses, a special sarcophagus, sharks, giant squid and a whopping 4,096 ways to win! 
A perfect blend of classic themes
Yggdrasil, the game producer, has decided to blend two classic themes beloved by the biggest slot players: fishing and Ancient Egypt.
In the past there was already "4 Fantastic Fish," and now the game takes place in Egypt. However, comparing the two slots, we find minor differences both in terms of graphics and gameplay. 
The game board is partially submerged in the clear waters of the Nile, and if it weren't for the pyramids and sphinxes on the background, we wouldn't know that we are in the land of the pharaohs. The symbols, drawn in a cartoon style, have soft and colorful lines that produce a three-dimensional effect.
Game features
The board of "4 Fantastic Fish in Egypt," slightly larger than usual, has 6 reels and 4 rows. That means that with each spin, we will see 24 symbols land, those needed to form one of the 4,096 ways to win.
The basic bet is very low, starting at just €0.10 and can be raised up to €80. The maximum win is 11,100 times the bet placed. The autoplay function activates automatic spins, a minimum of 5 and a maximum of 100. 
"4 Fantastic Fish in Egypt" has high volatility and an RTP of 96%.
Symbols and gameplay
First of all, to win it is necessary to create combos of at least 3 symbols for the low and medium-level ones. For the high-level ones, only 2 are enough. 
The least lucrative symbols are playing cards from ten to ace. The middle prizes are obtained thanks to the fisherman's box and fishing rod. The highest sums are won with the cat, the seagull, and Cleopatra. However, it is best to access the paytable to generate a precise estimate of the sums won.
Another symbol is the fish, which is always associated with a sum of money.
The yacht is the wild symbol and replaces all basic symbols to complete a winning combination. The swordfish is the scatter and you need 3 of them to get 3 respins. The reels on which the Bonus symbols have landed will be free, while the others will remain blocked. We will only see fish symbols that will remain stuck to the reels throughout the function. Also, every time one lands, the Respin count is reset to 3. The appearance of the Scatter on a blocked reel frees it, while if the reel is completely covered by fish, a shark will appear to eat them, multiplying the winnings by x2. 
Another scatter is the sarcophagus that can activate 4 functions:
- Shark, which, as we have seen, collects all prizes
- Giant squid that switches the positions of the fish to obtain winnings, or moves the fish from blocked reels to free ones.
- Collector: collects all the winnings without removing the fish (which will continue to pay off at the end of the function)
- Value increase: increases the value of the fish.
To win the jackpot, you need to land one of the giant fish on the 6th reel.

FAQ
How many ways are there to win?
There are 4,096 ways to win.

How can I win the jackpot?
To win the jackpot, you need one of the 4 special fish to land on the 6th reel.

How can I activate the special function?
Through the scatters or by purchasing the function.

In the new slot game "4 Fantastic Fish in Egypt" you will find amazing bonuses, a special sarcophagus, sharks, giant squid and a whopping 4,096 ways to win! 
A perfect blend of classic themes
Yggdrasil, the game producer, has decided to blend two classic themes beloved by the biggest slot players: fishing and Ancient Egypt.
In the past there was already "4 Fantastic Fish," and now the game takes place in Egypt. However, comparing the two slots, we find minor differences both in terms of graphics and gameplay. 
The game board is partially submerged in the clear waters of the Nile, and if it weren't for the pyramids and sphinxes on the background, we wouldn't know that we are in the land of the pharaohs. The symbols, drawn in a cartoon style, have soft and colorful lines that produce a three-dimensional effect.
Game features
The board of "4 Fantastic Fish in Egypt," slightly larger than usual, has 6 reels and 4 rows. That means that with each spin, we will see 24 symbols land, those needed to form one of the 4,096 ways to win.
The basic bet is very low, starting at just €0.10 and can be raised up to €80. The maximum win is 11,100 times the bet placed. The autoplay function activates automatic spins, a minimum of 5 and a maximum of 100. 
"4 Fantastic Fish in Egypt" has high volatility and an RTP of 96%.
Symbols and gameplay
First of all, to win it is necessary to create combos of at least 3 symbols for the low and medium-level ones. For the high-level ones, only 2 are enough. 
The least lucrative symbols are playing cards from ten to ace. The middle prizes are obtained thanks to the fisherman's box and fishing rod. The highest sums are won with the cat, the seagull, and Cleopatra. However, it is best to access the paytable to generate a precise estimate of the sums won.
Another symbol is the fish, which is always associated with a sum of money.
The yacht is the wild symbol and replaces all basic symbols to complete a winning combination. The swordfish is the scatter and you need 3 of them to get 3 respins. The reels on which the Bonus symbols have landed will be free, while the others will remain blocked. We will only see fish symbols that will remain stuck to the reels throughout the function. Also, every time one lands, the Respin count is reset to 3. The appearance of the Scatter on a blocked reel frees it, while if the reel is completely covered by fish, a shark will appear to eat them, multiplying the winnings by x2. 
Another scatter is the sarcophagus that can activate 4 functions:
- Shark, which, as we have seen, collects all prizes
- Giant squid that switches the positions of the fish to obtain winnings, or moves the fish from blocked reels to free ones.
- Collector: collects all the winnings without removing the fish (which will continue to pay off at the end of the function)
- Value increase: increases the value of the fish.
To win the jackpot, you need to land one of the giant fish on the 6th reel.

There are 4,096 ways to win.

How can I win the jackpot?
To win the jackpot, you need one of the 4 special fish to land on the 6th reel.

How can I activate the special function?
Through the scatters or by purchasing the function.
